mods.abstract: Curious about textbook sprints? So are we! Representatives from MacEwan University and the University of Alberta will share their experiences in exploring the implementation of textbook sprints in Alberta. Bring your questions and ideas and be prepared to share in this roundtable session where we will discuss textbook sprints and their implications for higher education in Alberta.Curious about textbook sprints? So are we! Representatives from MacEwan University and the University of Alberta will share their experiences in exploring the implementation of textbook sprints in Alberta. Bring your questions and ideas and be prepared to share in this roundtable session where we will discuss textbook sprints and their implications for higher education in Alberta. Presenters: Michelle Brailey (Libraries, University of Alberta), Alison Foster (MacEwan University Library).
mods.note: "The Campus Alberta Open Educational Resources (ABOER) Initiative is made possible through an investment from the Alberta government."
